song.title: Pokémon Trading Card Game, Credits
song.info:
Played live on the amazing [url=http://www.linusakesson.net/chipophone/index.php]Chipophone[/url]
Info from Linus:
"This is my Chipophone interpretation of the Credits music from the Pokémon Trading Card Game video game. The music was composed by Ichiro Shimakura in 1998.
First, a loop consisting of bass and drums is recorded. Then, the pedals are used to transpose the loop throughout the tune."
